SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package services

Class CampUpdateService

java.lang.Object
services.CampUpdateService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICampUpdateService
public class CampUpdateService extends Object implements ICampUpdateService
The CampUpdateService class implements the ICampUpdateService interface and provides services for updating camp information such as its name, dates fields and availability slots.
